attributes.action: If all MIGRANTS left the UK tomorrow, would the government continue with BREXIT
attributes.additional_details: I predicted the BREXIT Vote to be 49:51  - the Wednesday before the vote was cast.  I was not far off.
attributes.background: This government is too pressing for BREXIT that it is worrying for Migrant British Citizens.  I feel less and less British every day!  There seems to be a big, worrying and unknown outcome. The decades of contribution by those from Commonwealth countries is now worthless.  No body is consulted.
